email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax, built in 2018, with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per metric ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The vessel seems suitable, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider $49.75 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your prompt response. I can bring the freight rate down to $50.00 per metric ton, but $49.75 is too low. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $50.00 per metric ton, provided the laycan remains October 15-20. Can you confirm the vessel's availability and send over the charter party agreement? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $18,000 per day? Regards, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can confirm the vessel's availability for the laycan October 15-20. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Regarding demurrage, the best I can do is $19,000 per day. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $19,000 per day for demurrage is acceptable. Please proceed with the charter party agreement. Looking forward to finalizing this deal. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great news! I’ve sent the charter party agreement to your email. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
